sourcesContent:
<template>
  <button
    :class="`button
      ${fullwidth ? 'fullwidth' : ''}
    `"
    @click="$emit('click')">
    <slot></slot>
  </button>
</template>

<script lang="typescript">
import { Component, Vue, Props } from 'vue-property-decorator';

@Component()
export default class extends Vue {
  @Props() fullwidth!: string;
}

</script>

<style lang="scss" scoped>
.button {
  font-size: 22px;
  height: 48px;

  border: 0;
  border-radius: 5px;

  margin: 0;
  padding: 5px 30px 5px 30px;

  background: #efefef;
  box-shadow: #666 0 2px 2px;

  transition: all .2s ease;

  cursor: pointer;

  &.fullwidth {
    width: 100%;
  }

  &:hover {
    box-shadow: #666 0 5px 5px;
  }
}
</style>
